duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide financial planning and investment strategy services to clients, tailored to their individual needs and goals.
Build and maintain strong client relationships, offering guidance on investment options, insurance, and financial planning.
Analyze market trends and economic indicators to develop informed investment and financial strategies for clients.
Drive sales of financial products and services, identifying suitable investment opportunities and advising on risk management.
Ensure compliance with financial regulations and industry standards, maintaining high ethical and professional standards in all client interactions.
Deliver exceptional customer service, addressing client inquiries and concerns in a timely and effective manner.

education_certification.credential: Three or more years of investment sales experience
Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
